channel.title: mailcow: dockerized - Blog
channel.description: The mailserver suite with the 'moo' – 🐮 + 🐋 = 💕 | Official Blog Page

item.title: 🌌🐮 Mooay 2022 Update - The Tag Update | Revision C - Changelog
item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description: 2022-05c It´s us again again! This time we´ve published the 2022-05c Update which is a very small one. It changed the API a bit again. This time for security reasons. Head over to GitHub to see the full changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/releases/tag/2022-05c Stay healthy Niklas 2022-05b It´s us again! Today we have a small API Fix Update which focus mainly on the UI. As some of you reported the API Calls for Domains/Mailboxes don´t work anymore if there is no Tag set.
